about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Indo Caris International
about.description: We are a leading IT consulting company based in Indonesia, providing innovative digital solutions for businesses of all sizes.
about.mission_text: To empower businesses with cutting-edge technology solutions that drive growth and innovation.
about.vision_text: To be the preferred technology partner for enterprises across Indonesia and Southeast Asia.
about.value1_text: We constantly explore new technologies and methodologies.
about.value2_text: We are committed to delivering the highest quality.
about.value3_text: We act with honesty and transparency.
about.value4_text: We work together with clients as partners.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Solutions for Your Digital Transformation
services.service1_desc: Custom software solutions tailored to your business needs, from web applications to enterprise systems.
services.service2_desc: Strategic guidance to help you leverage technology for business growth and efficiency.
services.service3_desc: End-to-end modernization of your business operations with cutting-edge digital solutions.
services.service4_desc: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.
services.service5_desc: Cloud migration, architecture, and managed services for scalability and security.
services.service6_desc: Ongoing technical support and maintenance to keep your systems running smoothly.
